backend/main.mo: Main canister logic defining user profiles, experience records with categories and stats, access control, and CRUD-style methods for signup and experience creation.
backend/migration.mo: Migration utility that upgrades old experience records by adding category, stats fields, and gameplay controls while preserving existing data.
feature_evidence.json: Evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs for build traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten list of short summaries for many frontend files used across the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme configuration defining color variables, dark mode values, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets up the root element and loads the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Router configuration defining all application routes and wrapping the app with theme and toast providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthButtons: Authentication UI with login, signup, and logout handlers based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireProf: Route guard requiring authentication and a completed user profile before granting access to protected pages.
frontend/src/components/experiences/Expe: Displays an experience card with thumbnail, title, description, creator info, and navigation on click.
Renders a grid of experience cards with loading skeletons and an empty state message.
Provides thumbs-up/down rating buttons for an experience with authentication checks and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/experiences/InGa: Implements an in-game menu with leave, reset character, and settings dialogs.
frontend/src/components/experiences/Publ: Form dialog for creating and publishing a new experience, including thumbnail upload and validation.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header, sidebar, footer, and routed content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/LeftSideb: Renders a sidebar with navigation links and icons for profile, inventory, groups, and settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Displays the site footer with copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Renders the main site header with logo, navigation links, auth buttons, and a mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileH: Shows a user's profile header with avatar, name, and navigation buttons, handling loading and null states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current user’s principal and role using the actor, exposing auth status and loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useExperiences.ts: Provides queries and mutations for listing, searching, fetching, creating, rating, and updating experience data via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing authentication, identity loading, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Queries and mutates user profile data, including fetching profiles and signing up new users through the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base setup and CSS variables for light and dark themes with global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, wrapping it in query and identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AvatarShop.tsx: Renders a placeholder avatar shop page with category cards and a coming soon message.
frontend/src/pages/Create.tsx: Displays creation tool features, prompts unauthenticated users to log in, and includes a coming soon section for the studio.
frontend/src/pages/DiniBucks.tsx: Displays Dini Bucks info with login prompt or balance and showcases earning, spending, trading, and premium options.
frontend/src/pages/Discover.tsx: Provides search, trending, and category-based browsing of experiences with an option to publish when authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/ExperienceDetails.tsx: Shows detailed experience info, creator data, controls, and simulated play state with play/leave handling.
frontend/src/pages/Groups.tsx: Renders a placeholder Groups page showing that the user has not joined any groups yet.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Displays a personalized welcome, recommended experiences, and friend activity with navigation shortcuts.
frontend/src/pages/Inventory.tsx: Shows an empty inventory state encouraging users to acquire items from the Avatar Shop.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Shows the user's profile and lists their published experiences using a protected profile wrapper.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Presents a placeholder account settings page indicating configuration is coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/SignUp.tsx: Implements the sign‑up flow using Internet Identity, allowing users to set a display name and optional avatar upload before creating their profile.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL or session.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current state, requirements, features, and architectural notes for the Dini.Verse platform.
